OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.PrologException Class Reference

A PrologException is used as the exception thrown by YP.throw(Term). More...

Classes

class  ExistenceErrorInfo
class  TypeErrorInfo

Public Member Functions

ExistenceErrorInfo getExistenceErrorInfo ()
 Return the ExistenceErrorInfo for this exception, or null if _term does not match error(existence_error(Type, Culprit), Message). If the returned ExistenceErrorInfo _Culprit is procedure, you can use its getProcedureName and getProcedureArity.
TypeErrorInfo getTypeErrorInfo ()
 Return the TypeErrorInfo for this exception, or null if _term does not match error(type_error(Type, Culprit), Message).
 PrologException (object Term)
 Create a PrologException with the given Term. The printable exception message is the full Term.
 PrologException (object ErrorTerm, object Message)
 Create a PrologException where the Term is error(ErrorTerm, Message). This uses YP.makeCopy to copy the ErrorTerm and Message so that they are valid after unbinding.

Public Attributes

readonly object _term

Detailed Description

A PrologException is used as the exception thrown by YP.throw(Term).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.PrologException.PrologException ( object  Term  ) 

Create a PrologException with the given Term. The printable exception message is the full Term.

Parameters:
Term the term of the exception
OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.PrologException.PrologException ( object  ErrorTerm,
object  Message 
)

Create a PrologException where the Term is error(ErrorTerm, Message). This uses YP.makeCopy to copy the ErrorTerm and Message so that they are valid after unbinding.

Parameters:
ErrorTerm the error term of the error
Messsage the message term of the error. If this is a string, it is converted to an Atom so it can be used by Prolog code. Message, converted to a string, is use as the printable exception message.

Member Function Documentation

ExistenceErrorInfo OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.PrologException.getExistenceErrorInfo (  ) 

Return the ExistenceErrorInfo for this exception, or null if _term does not match error(existence_error(Type, Culprit), Message). If the returned ExistenceErrorInfo _Culprit is procedure, you can use its getProcedureName and getProcedureArity.

Returns:
TypeErrorInfo OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.PrologException.getTypeErrorInfo (  ) 

Return the TypeErrorInfo for this exception, or null if _term does not match error(type_error(Type, Culprit), Message).

Returns:
